did.unittitle: Letter from James Thomas Fields to Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, n.d.
did.physdesc: This holding consists of a single letter, ALS, 3p.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letter from James Thomas Fields to Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, Accession # 6976-r, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This holding was transferred on January 6, 1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter to Professor [Henry Wadsworth] Longfellow, J[ames]T[homas]Fields asks Longfellow to take his extra copy of Ballads and Other Poemsin return for one of the Voices of the Nightso that he could complete his set of Longfellow's books. He also suggests that Longfellow's inscription in the book "will enhance its value"!
